reviews.text:
Fusion bar and restaurant in great location. Bay front view to bay light show. It's pricey for location I suppose.
Indoor and outdoor seating. High tables. Small but to the point food items. Great veal sausage. Delicious chicken skewers.
Large variety of drinks.
Accepts CC and touchless payments.
Vibrant Live music after 8pm. Great for small gathering, couples, seniors and mostly tourists.

We found this place when looking for a nice place to celebrate my 30th birthday. The staff were so lovely, including our server Joyce! Food was delicious and when it came time for dessert, the singer and staff all sung me happy birthday. Such a lovely evening!

This lounge is really romantic with fancy bar…and the waitress named Ravneet did awesome and friendly service for me.
Because the weather is damn hot and I wanna drink flavored sparkling water,she recommended me French lemonjito I really enjoy it! She truly gave me incredible service and I felt glad. It’s incredible afternoon! Love everything here! Xoxo

Dining at the restaurant was a truly delightful experience.  The ambiance and the delicious food created a wonderful evening.  The service provided by Joyce and Katherine elevated the entire dining experience.  Their attentiveness and warm hospitality were truly appreciated.  We look forward to returning to the restaurant soon.

Vikki was prompt and attentive. She got our order within 5 minutes of being seated. And the band….Nick was a great vocalist and had our attention for hours. We got up to dance on most songs. Great night out.
